name: Yangtze River Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.
description: Yangtze River Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd. is a leading pharmaceutical company based in China, primarily engaged in the research, development, manufacturing, and marketing of a wide range of pharmaceutical products. Founded in the 1990s, the company has grown to become one of the largest suppliers of active pharmaceutical ingredients (APIs) and finished dosage forms in the region. Yangtze River is committed to innovation and quality, focusing on therapeutic areas such as cardiovascular, oncology, and infectious diseases. The company operates numerous state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities that comply with international quality standards, ensuring the safety and efficacy of its products. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Yangtze River invests significantly in new drug discovery, aiming to address unmet medical needs both domestically and globally. The company’s mission is to improve health outcomes through high-quality pharmaceuticals while promoting accessibility and affordability in healthcare. Additionally, Yangtze River is expanding its presence in international markets, reinforcing its position as a key player in the global pharmaceutical industry.

seo.meta_title: Yangtze River Pharmaceutical Group | Leading Chinese Pharmaceutical Company
seo.meta_description: Discover Yangtze River Pharmaceutical Group, a key player in the pharmaceutical industry focused on innovation and quality. Learn about their products, mission, and commitment to healthcare.

faq.question: What does Yangtze River Pharmaceutical specialize in?
faq.answer: Yangtze River Pharmaceutical specializes in the research, development, and manufacturing of pharmaceutical products and active pharmaceutical ingredients.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Yangtze River Pharmaceutical?
faq.answer: Yang Xu is the CEO of Yangtze River Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

faq.question: Where is Yangtze River Pharmaceutical headquartered?
faq.answer: Yangtze River Pharmaceutical is headquartered in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

faq.question: What are the main therapeutic areas of focus for Yangtze River?
faq.answer: Yangtze River focuses on therapeutic areas such as cardiovascular health, oncology, and infectious diseases.

faq.question: When was Yangtze River Pharmaceutical founded?
faq.answer: Yangtze River Pharmaceutical was founded in the 1990s.
